body_html: @PhilippPelz Hi, I'm quite confused about THPP part you implemented. Why it has dependency on thrust in Traits.hpp?. This will cause error when compiling without cuda. Is it possible to only use like or <complex.h> in Traits.hpp? I haven't figure it out. Maybe you could offer some clues?
body_text: @PhilippPelz Hi, I'm quite confused about THPP part you implemented. Why it has dependency on thrust in Traits.hpp?. This will cause error when compiling without cuda. Is it possible to only use like  or <complex.h> in Traits.hpp? I haven't figure it out. Maybe you could offer some clues?
body: @PhilippPelz Hi, I'm quite confused about `THPP` part you implemented. Why it has dependency on thrust in `Traits.hpp`?. This will cause error when compiling without cuda. Is it possible to only use like <complex> or <complex.h> in `Traits.hpp`? I haven't figure it out. Maybe you could offer some clues?
